channel.title: I build visualisations and tools to help you understand, explore and communicate your data on Data Viz + Business Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in I build visualisations and tools to help you understand, explore and communicate your data on Data Viz + Business Analysis

item.title: Print-ready reports and handouts
item.description: I make print-ready visualistions, for your annual reports, posters or handouts. I can work with your company’s branding, style guides and template, and produce compelling and informative visualisations to strengthen your messages and insights.

item.title: Dashboards
item.description: I make dashboards, using the applications you already use within your company, such as Tableau, Qlik or Power BI. I can take you past the system defaults and apply best practice to how your charts are designed so that your audiences can get the insights they need quickly and correctly.

item.title: Interactive online visualisations
item.description: I make online visualisations and maps, so that your customers can interact and play with your data and analysis. The visualisations I build are web-standards based, and meet accessibility and responsive needs.

item.title: Advice and training
item.description: I can help your team improve the data presentation skills, either within their existing applications or learning more wider data visualisation best practice and theory.

item.title: Business and process analysis
item.description: I can apply my wealth of buiness analysis experience to your data practices. I can work with your staff and customers to identify requirements and improvements to your data processes and systems.

item.title: Things I don't do...
item.description: To save your time, these are things I don’t do: Data science or in-depth statistical analysis. However I understand the field, and can work with your data scientist and statisticians to make their insights more easily accessibile to different audiences.
